activities: Gartner, Inc. receives personal information related to its associates, clients. prosects, employees, workers, and other individuals who are located in the European Economic Area and Switzerland. recoursemech: Gartner, Inc. is committed to full cooperation with data protection authorities located in the European Union (EU DPAs) and Switzerland (Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)) or their authorized representatives.
